i was hesitant about getting this bag at first, i put on a yolo mindset and went ahead and ordered it. considering it had a 5 star global review but there was no action written review, i didn't know what to expect. but ive never had any issues getting refunds or item replacements from Amazon, so i feel pretty safe.  i wanna start off first by saying these stock photos look like they come from the cheap sites/apps like Wish, Shein, Temu of Aliexpress. i don't know how many of these purses there are, i don't believe it's sold from Amazon so something tells me these are handmade from like a small business? just a guess.  i also wanna point out the inside of the purse doesn't have two compartments, it's just one large opening but there is a small compartment on the side. second, there is no zipper compartment on the back like it shows. i don't mind though, the bag is so cute and i love it regardless. i didn't look too hard at the stock photos or even at all so i had no set expectations.  so my one star rating is for the photos not being accurate by any means. other than that, id rate this purse 5 stars. in my mind i do if there wasn't false advertisement.
looks like the picture and does have the hello kitty charm on it which i love!! not bad for the price. can fit a lot in it and also adjustable for those like me who love crossbody straps.
